summary: A quirky rom-com where Kush finds the ideal Indian bride Dimple for his brother Luv and a series of comical and unpredictable events follow.
cast: Imran Khan|Katrina Kaif|Ali Zafar|Tara D'Souza|Parikshit Sahni|Kanwaljit Singh|Suparna Marwah|Arfeen Khan|Mohammed Zeeshan Ayyub|Tariq Vasudeva|Brijendra Kala|Kusum Talwar|Vijay Mohan|Veena Mohan|Monica Kohli|Ayesha Khanna|Aradhana Khanna|Sunny Dagar|Sufi Malhotra|Everson Dos Santos Sander|Salina Prakash|Tanmay Mohan|Suyash Kumar|Sonia Birje|Anagha Sahamate|Jineet Rath|Aadit Hate|Debbie Dutta|Camila Granato|Taciane Matos|Mani|Hari Om Jalota|Madhulika|Shiraz Khan|Bharat Bhushan Verma|Dimple Bagroy|Abhiraj Minawala|Azhar Ahmed|Shakir Ali Khan|Nisha Singh|Ravi Kant Bhala|Narinder Nina|Ajay Gaur|Hussein Qureshi|Poonam Nabha|Rati Shankar Tripathi|Bikram Mann|Liza|Kamlesh|Vijay Saxena|Meena Verma|Shams Alam Zaidi|Ahilya Akoi|John Abraham|Karamveer Choudhary|Mahru Sheikh|Kapil Madaan
title: Mere Brother Ki Dulhan
